dove.util.struct.tree

Class Tree.TreeScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.TreeScheduler
  • Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    protected static class Tree.TreeScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    if this tree is threadsafe, this scheduler will controll reading and writing access to avoid data inconsitency and handle the priority of these tasks only one access at once, aswell reading as writing

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Tree.TreeScheduler.LockHelper
      runs incoming tasks, and sorts them according to their (updated) priority
      static class  Tree.TreeScheduler.State
      the current state of the scheduler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Object awaitTaskLock
      the lock for awaiting a task this lock is used whenever the scheduler waits for new tasks, or a new task is incoming
      private static java.util.Comparator<Tree.TreeTask> comp
      comparator for treetasks used to update the waiting queues and determine, which task should be executed first
      private Tree.TreeScheduler.State currentState
      the current state of the scheduler
      private Tree.TreeScheduler.LockHelper lockHelper
      the lockhelper corresponding to this treescheduler
      private boolean quitScheduler
      if this flag is true, the scheduler will finish all queued tasks and stop, no further tasks will be accepted as soon as this flag is set true
      private java.lang.Object quitSchedulerLock
      the lock for quitScheduler this lock is used whenever the quitScheduler-variable is accessed
      private java.util.List<Tree.TreeTask> readingWaitList
      list of tasks waiting to read the tree
      private java.util.List<Tree.TreeTask> writingWaitList
      list of tasks waiting to write to the tree

      TreeScheduler()

      lets the scheduler wait for the next incoming task

      <R> Tree.TreeTask<R> invokeAndWait(Tree.TreeOp<R> r, Tree.TreeTask.TaskOpType type)
      creates a new task and awaits its execution the task is given normal priority
      <R> Tree.TreeTask<R> invokeAndWait(Tree.TreeOp<R> r, Tree.TreeTask.TaskOpType type, int priority)
      creates a new TreeTask and waits until the task is finished

      creates a new TreeTask and lines it up in the waitingqueue the task has normal priority

      creates a new TreeTask and lines it up in the waitingqueue
      private Tree.TreeTask nextTask() 
      private void nextTaskAvailable()
      notifys the scheduler that a new task is available
      void quitScheduler() 
      private boolean quitSchedulerOn() 
      private void recalculatePriorities()
      updates the prioritys of tasks tasks that have waited for more than waitingtime = 100ms * (MAX_PRIORITY + 1 - tasks priority), will be granted a higher priority, until they reach the maximum priority afterwards, the waitingqueues will be updated to match the new priorityvalues

      • recalculatePriorities

        private void recalculatePriorities()
        updates the prioritys of tasks tasks that have waited for more than waitingtime = 100ms * (MAX_PRIORITY + 1 - tasks priority), will be granted a higher priority, until they reach the maximum priority afterwards, the waitingqueues will be updated to match the new priorityvalues
